page.title: 12Local News from the Papers
page.content: The application to store potentially {dangerous chemicals}just outside Sandbach was given the go-ahead last week. It would mean allowing six 10000 gallon liquid storage tanks to be built. The former Crewe Chemical works opposite the canal on the west side near the bridge. Members of the Council thought that the Health and Safety Department should have been allowed more time to talk about the plan. { Sandbach Service Station}on the M6 serves the best{cup of tea}on Britain's motorways said a panel of experts who have travelled the motorways in June 1985. The panel was put together by the Milk Marketing Board and the Tea Council to survey the standard of tea and fresh milk in the service stations all over Britain.
